content.question: Source: Natural Earth GIS The map shows the locations of world financial, banking, and investment centers. Which of the following best explains a limitation of the mapâ€™s representation of global economic patterns?

choices.label: The map does not show major population centers located in the Southern Hemisphere.
The map does not show the locations of export processing zones in more developed countries.
The map does not show the growth of investment in businesses in less developed countries.
The map does not show growth poles that stimulate regional economic activity.
The map does not show the environmental pollution associated with industrial cities.

content.answer: The map does not show the growth of investment in businesses in less developed countries.
